data.description: Perl API to the CCP Data Model and software
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The requested namespace is to manage Perl interface and support to
    DataModel and software related to CCPN and CCP4
    (http://www.ccpn.ac.uk/project/about_ccpn/about_ccpn.html).

    The inmediate interest is to provide a Perl API to the CCP Data
    Model for NMR and Protein Production. Already under development are
    Python and Java API
    (http://www.ccpn.ac.uk/ccpnmr/ccpnmr/model/doc/index.html)
